column4: I seem to have an issue when putting files on a remote machine by sftp (sshfs), I'd guess something spikes to 100% CPU which renders the box practically useless. Any recommendations on how to log this? top freezes just like everything else during these blackouts.
does scp show the same performance?
Hm... Just stumbled upon something, might be completely unrelated to the actual transfer... Sorry to disturb for nothing. :)
